attributes.action: Force Mi5 to investigate Pedophile MP's
attributes.additional_details:
It is the will of those who sign this petition, to see pedophiles within our parliament, brought to justice for the sake of the victims involved.

We call upon our National Intellegence service, to use their resources, in supporting Scotland Yard with investigations into the crimes alleged.

It is important to our society, that individuals in seats of power, are not commiting henious sexual acts.  It is also important that those who hold information are protected as whistleblowers.
